questions.question_text: Sarvam dur-vyasanam tyājyam sarvaih _________ sadā । Aneka-roga-dukhānām kāraṇam vyasanam yataha ॥ 26 ॥
questions.explanation: The shlok states 'Sarvam dur-vyasanam tyājyam sarvaih satsangibhih sadā'.

questions.question_text: “jene niṣhkāmī vartamān draḍh hoy to te thakī ame hajār gāu chheṭe jaīe to paṇ tenī pāse ja chhīe; ane jene te niṣhkāmī vartamānmā kāchyap chhe ne te jo amārī pāse rahe chhe toy paṇ te lākh gāu chheṭe chhe. Ane amane niṣhkāmī bhakta hoy tenā ja hāthnī karī sevā game chhe.”
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 33.

questions.question_text: Surā-bhangā-tamālādi yad yad bhaveddhi _________ । Tad bhakṣhayet piben-naiva dhūmra-pānam api tyajet ॥ 27 ॥
questions.explanation: The shlok states 'Surā-bhangā-tamālādi yad yad bhaveddhi mādakam'.

questions.question_text:
Pānche vartmān pāḷe, bāīo ne bhāīo,
Harijan sangāthe kīdhī, sāchī sagāīo rāj... Akshar 2
questions.explanation: These lines are from Kirtan Akshar 2.

questions.question_text: Pari-tyājyam sadā dyūtam sarvaih ________ । Tyaktavyo vyabhichārash-cha nārībhih puruṣhais-tathā ॥ 28 ॥
questions.explanation: The shlok states 'Pari-tyājyam sadā dyūtam sarvaih sarva-prakārakam'.

questions.question_text: Kyārey manuṣhya, pashu, pakṣhī, tathā mānkaḍ ādik koī paṇ jīv-jantuonī hinsā na karavī. Ahinsā param dharma chhe, hinsā adharma chhe em Shruti-Smṛutyādi shāstromā spaṣhṭa kahevāmā āvyu chhe. (33-34)
questions.explanation: This is the translation of Satsang Diksha Shloks 33 and 34.

questions.question_text: Mānsam matsyam tathā’nḍāni bhakṣhayeyur na karhichit । Palānḍum lashunam hingu na cha ________ janāhā ॥ 29 ॥
questions.explanation: The shlok states 'Mānsam matsyam tathā’nḍāni bhakṣhayeyur na karhichit । Palānḍum lashunam hingu na cha satsangino janāhā'.

questions.question_text:
Avani par āvī vahāle satsang sthāpyo
Harijanone kol, kalyāṇno āpyo rāj... Akshar 1
questions.explanation: These lines are from Kirtan Akshar 1.

questions.question_text: Chauryam na karhichit kāryam satsangam ________ janaihi । Dharmārtham api no kāryam chora-kāryam tu karhichit ॥ 31 ॥
questions.explanation: The shlok states 'Chauryam na karhichit kāryam satsangam āshritair janaihi'.

questions.question_text: Puṣhp, faḷo jevī vastu paṇ tenā dhaṇīnī paravāngī vagar na levī. Paravāngī vagar levu te sūkṣhma chorī kahevāy chhe. (32)
questions.explanation: This is the translation of Satsang Diksha Shlok 32.
